column2: "This needs stamina suitable to make it arrive at the Lillipans who live deep in the Desert!"
"I've no complaints about how they came out, thanks to you! I'll be finished once they arrive!"
"...but, I'm a little anxious that Fourier won't be able to make the delivery on his own for me."
"If it's okay with you, would you mind acting as his guard? If you go with him, I'm sure Fourier will be happy, too!"
